item.title: Travel Award, Delft, The Netherland
item.description:
Overview

The EPSRC-funded SofIoTS project generously provided a research travel grant, facilitating my participation in the esteemed 12th Conference of IoT at TU Delft, The Netherlands. I had the privilege of presenting my paper at this prominent event. #IoTDelft. For more detail please visit conference page.

item.title: Travel Award
item.description:
Overview

In order to present my research paper in a local conference, the Hankuk University of Foreign studies awarded me a research travel award.

item.title: Travel Award Dan Nang, Vietnam

Overview

In order to present my research paper in a The 31st International Conference on Information Networking (ICOIN), the Hankuk University of Foreign studies awarded me a research travel award.
